deprecated_yaml_binary_sensor.title: Command Line YAML configuration has been deprecated
deprecated_yaml_binary_sensor.description:
Configuring Command Line Binary Sensors using YAML has been deprecated.

Consult the documentation to move your YAML configura to integration key and restart Home Assistant to resolve this issue.
